name: Thieving a Phantom
description:
Thieving a Phantom was made for the 47th weekly game jam. Your a thief trying to make a living but the only houses left to steal from are haunted.  Sneak past ghosts/phantoms and try not to get caught,  and be careful when you steal their coins their a little like dragons.

Controls: mouse to look, Arrows or w,a,s,d to move, right click to pick up, and shift to run.

Goal: To find all coins with out getting caught.

Coin inside a basket:
